title.narrative: EDUCATION OP 2 IMPROVED QUALITY OF THE SERVICE

description.narrative: By 2023 there is evidence that the MEN is taking measures to turn schools into child-friendly institutions that offer effective learning experiences and address diversity of gender, disability, language, and other factors., which contributes to Access To Quality Learning Opportunities, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Innovation, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2023 more boys and girls (5-18 years old) in Madagascar, specially the most excluded, will be exposed to effective learning experiences that will lead to the acquisition of the necessary competencies for an enriching life.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2023 there is evidence that the MEN is taking measures to turn schools into child-friendly institutions that offer effectivelearning experiences and address diversity of gender, disability, language, and other factors.

description.narrative: In 2021, 21,800 school directors, teacher trainers, supervisors and teachers benefitted from at least one training activity to strengthen their skills in one of these areas: pedagogy, inclusive education, refresher courses, TaRL approach, school management and implementation of the Education-Environment networks. The school programme overhaul for the 9 grades of basic education from pre-primary to lower secondary was well initiated and achieved, and 750 pedagogical scripts to set up radio programmes are available. The key constraint was the overlapping of several training activities for the education partners during the holiday period. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:07/01/2022
